lead_paragraph: American journeyman Jim Herman earned a last-minute invitation to the Masters when he secured a one-stroke victory at the Houston Open on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Herman Wins Houston Open to Earn Masters Invite
headline.main: Herman Wins Houston Open to Earn Masters Invite
